author: DeAnn Komanecky
title: Annual Effingham Fair Parade marches
text:
Photos Back | Next Photos by DeAnn Komanecky/Effingham Now
Back | Next DeAnn Komanecky/Effingham Now

By DeAnn Komanecky
Large crowds lined most of the length of Laurel Street on Monday for the annual Effingham County Fair Parade.
Theme for this year’s fair is “A Carnival of Products.”
The fair also opened and runs all week, ending on Oct. 24. Gates for the fair open each night at 5 p.m.
Tickets for all you can ride are $15 on Wednesday. Special ride pricing is available all week.
Admission is $5, under age 6 is free. For a full list of ride pricing and fair entertainment, go to www.effingahmfair.org.
Look online at spotted.savannahnow.com for a gallery of parade and fair photos.
